VuWall Video Wall Management & SkySoft Recording and Playback
UNIFIED VISUALIZATION AND POST-ACTION REVIEW FOR CONTROL ROOM OPERATIONS
VuWall and SkySoft enhance control room operations with a comprehensive and integrated video wall solution.

VuWall’s leading video wall management solution combined with SkySoft’s best-in-class recording software empower operators with complete video wall control including recording and playback capabilities for post-action review and incident analysis.
